cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.
{UB}{UB}: Put a spotlight counter on target creature you control. [i](It becomes legendary and gains menace.)[/i]

When Idiosyncratic Savant enters, if you control a storied permanent, put two +1/+1 counters on up to one other target creature. If you control three or more differently named storied permanents, you may exile it instead. [i](Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, for each kind of counter among permanents you control, you may put a counter of that kind on a permanent you control.

Flying

Creatures you control attacking cause abilities of that creature to trigger as though it entered.

Other Humans you control get +1/+1.
Tap ten untapped Humans you control: Midnight Sommelier deals 10 damage to any target.

Deathtouch
Once each turn, when you conjure a land card into your hand, you may put it onto the battlefield.

Menace

Prowess

[i](This card is conjured and not otherwise legal.)[/i]
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

When Touka enters, if a creature died this turn, draw a card.
When Touka dies during your turn, you may exile her. Until the end of your next turn, you may pay {1}{U}{B}{R} as a sorcery to return her to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Menace, haste
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a copy of a creature card in your graveyard by exiling that card in addition to its other costs.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]“I should've known those other unnecessary emotions were holding me back.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](This card is conjured by sensation and not otherwise legal.)[/i]
When Beloved Antihero enters, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Each player can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery and can't cast more than one spell each turn.
